page.title: 15Business in Aughnacloy
page.content: Approximately{55}businesses are carried on in the town,the most common being shops selling{foodstuffs,public {bars}and{garages}and{petrol filling {stations.}As the following count shows. {Foodstores,hardware,fancy goods, {newspapers}_ 10. { {Public bars}_ 9. { {Garages}and{filling stations}7 Other businesses include 5{ {restaurants,4 home baked bread shops,} 3 each of{clothes shops,cycle repair {shops}and{butcher shops.1 wine store,1 {Post Offices}and{2}each of{Chemist {shops,banks}and{guest houses. The only country business is a guest house and{caravan}hire shop ,two miles out the Augher Road.In most cases the shops are family owned and run by husband and wife.
